title: Writing in Standard Form

title: Finding The Characteristics
text: From the equation, we can see that $$p=1$$, and the vertex is $$(0,0)$$. Because $$p=1$$, we know that the focus is $$(0,1)$$ and the directrix is $$y=-1$$
